text: Then I found out you can #Treat #Cancer with #Cannabis ~ My mind went to if it #treats #Cancers can we not #Eat for #prevention ~ No they think #THC a cannabinoid is a Drug it is a #Nutrient #JimCrow taught us it's bad. #Science 1940s replaced with alternative facts #AmericaFirst https://t.co/03clQExe78 https://t.co/YkU27X6nTb
